newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Stockpile sells 655 tonnes tin at $2.705/lb.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Stockpile sells 655 tonnes tin at $2.705/lb.

text.p: The U.S. Defense Logistics Agency said Monday that it sold 655 tonnes of stockpile tin to six firms at a unit price of $2.705 per lb.
DLA sold 240 tonnes of tin to RMT of New York, N.Y. and 200 tonnes to Baron Metals, also of New York City. It sold 180 tonnes to American Iron & Metal of Quebec, Canada.

Ingot Metal Co Ltd of Toronto, Canada bought 15 tonnes of Longhorn tin. Non-Ferrous Processing of Brooklyn, N.Y. bought 10 tonnes of Longhorn tin, while Ney Smelting, also of Brooklyn, bought the remaining 10 tonnes.
